Morphological Adorner

MorphAdorner adorns words in text with morphological tags.

See:
          Description

Packages
com.megginson.sax SAX-based XML output filters.
de.spieleck.app.cngram Implementation of character based ngrams.
de.spieleck.util Utilities used by ngram profiler.
edu.northwestern.at.morphadorner MorphAdorner adorns texts with word-based morphological information such as parts of speech and lemmata.

MorphAdorner adorns words in text with morphological tags.
